titleStmt.title: Good nevves for all true hearted subjects videlicet, The Parliament goes on. / Written by Francis Mussell, vintner.
titleStmt.author: Mussell, Francis.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed with licence, by R.H. for T.B. and are to be sold at his shop in the Old Bayly,

notesStmt.note: In verse - "Though Times be troublous, yet true peace I bring".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in the Old Bayly
